body: Buddah, the husband is a hitman how is that not obvious to you? Also chicken guy is a beta male, trust me when I say its a fool's bet to bank on him coming out on top. SPOILER ALERT! The Red head doesn't die but she gonna suffer a lot before the story draws to a close.
And can someone explain to me what the husbands job is😧
I hope that red head dies, husband leaves wife, and wife is with chicken guy lol

go awayy red head bitchhh 
leave mum and dad alone. xD
tbh none of the characters are likeable.
I also hope that that chicken guy get taken care of by which I mean taken out by which I mean killed
I like the red head I hope she takes out the wife
I hope "mommy" kills the red head bitch.
